body.name: Carter's by DaVinci Colby 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib with Trundle Drawer in Grey and White, Greenguard Gold Certified, Undercrib Storage
features: GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: This product has undergone rigorous scientific testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions and VOCs. It contributes to cleaner indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play, and grow

GROWS WITH BABY: 4 adjustable mattress positions that can be lowered as your baby begins to sit and stand. Converts to mini toddler bed, daybed, and twin-size bed (mini toddler conversion kit No. M20399 and twin-size conversion kit No. M5789 sold separately)
QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of solid sustainable New Zealand pinewood and TSCA compliant engineered wood -only the best for your baby
FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY: Say goodbye to toxic chemicals. Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe

COMPLETE THE LOOK: Shop Colby 3-Drawer Dresser & 6-Drawer Dresser for a coordinated nursery. While this crib is a standard size mini crib, for a best fit we recommend DaVinci's line of non-toxic, GREENGUARD gold mattresses. Includes 1" waterproof pad
body.description: The Colby 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib with Trundle is a more compact, space-efficient version of the customers' Favorite Colby 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Trundle. It features clean lines and a spacious, built-in Trundle for a beautiful and practical nursery. The Colby mini crib grows with your child with its four different mattress height positions and converts into a mini toddler bed, daybed, and twin-size bed to grow with your child (conversion kits sold separately).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Colby 3-Drawer Dresser Complete Slumber Mini Crib Mattress Adrian Swivel Glider with Storage Ottoman Colby 4-in-1 Low Profile Convertible Crib Colby 6-Drawer Double Dresser Shown In White - Performance Grey Linen Petal Pink Grey/White

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces!
reviews.reviewText: Needed a small crib for a smaaaall bedroom space, but didn’t want to use a pack n play. This mini crib takes up about the same amount of room as a pack n play and is so much more comfortable and cute!!! It’s very well built and has higher and lower levels for the mattress (is on the highest level in photo). Lower level will be nice when baby is older. It also has a storage drawer underneath which is an awesome plus when one is challenged for space!;) Very happy all ‘round with this purchase✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Instructions were easy to follow, looks beautiful. Definitely feel that we will be able to transition through sleep stages and this will hold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one and loved it so bought another one so both of my twins now have one. Took a while to ship and assembly always stinks to do but great solid crib! Decent price too! The mattress it comes with is not great. We use newton mini crib mattresses in the two cribs. They fit perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like the crib except…
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute crib and wasn’t too hard to put together. However, when I took it out of the box it had a strong chemical smell. I put the wood part of the crib on my porch to air out for over a week. It did help a little. The crib is now in my room and I can still smell it. Maybe I have a sensitive nose, but it bothers me and I don’t feel good about putting my baby into a crib that smells like that. For now I have an air purifier on 24/7 and I’m hoping that it will off-gas more. I bought an expensive baby green guard mattress for this crib, but it seems pointless with the smell from the crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mini crib.
reviews.reviewText: I was worried that I couldn’t find a mini crib to fit in the corner of my room. This fit perfectly!! Love it, with I bought this when I had my twins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best crib for us
reviews.reviewText: We looked for a long time for the best crib for us. We have limited space in our room so a mini crib was our best option. This one is very secure and it’s an amazing quality. It comes with a thin mat but we bought the mattress separately. This one came just with the mini crib kit and the expansion kits for the toddler bed and twin bed are sold apart. This is perfect for what we needed. The price is very attractive compare to the other options we looked at and again, quality is perfect for the little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mini crib!
reviews.reviewText: Mini crib is great in my small apartment. Baby is in a room with a queen size bed so couldn’t fit a regular crib. I assembled this on my own postpartum c section in about 90 minutes. Directions are clear like ikea directions with illustrations. I love the drawer underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for a smaller room
